body:
Hey guys, Ive somehow only just realised that I've passed the one year mark on Avicus!
Anyways in 'commemoration' of reaching a year on this incredible server, i was thinking of constructing a list of all the players that have passed a year, and are still active on the server.

Just comment your name, and ill check your stats to see if you qualify for this veterans list!

Anyways, congrats to everyone who's passed a year, hope to add you to the list soon :)

+ = 2 years and over

VETERAN COUNT:
1+ Years: 90 Avicadians
2+ Years: 19 Avicadians
3+ Years: 0 Avicadians

LIST:

All is updated!

Seriously now, with all these veterans, I'm starting to question, shouldn't we actually have some kind of icon/emblem for this?

Anyways congratulations guys, this list has stretched far beyond i think anybodies expectations!

replies.body:
Okay ill add you, but then again if having a veteran rank/symbol is nothing/just showing off then whats the point in prestiging?

I mean could i just argue that prestiging is just a way to show off that you have a higher level then others?

I respect your opinion and know exactly what you mean, but still it would be cool to have as like a reward for playing for so long 
(although playing on Avicus is a reward in itself :) )

But yeah, ill add you now :D

replies.body:
But isn't a veteran not so different from that?

It encourages players who may be starting to get bored after a few months of playing to keep going for the veteran rank, and its not something you have to be good at to get, its more like an acknowledgement for someones dedication towards being a part of the community and game..

Anyway it won't bother me too much, I'm only bringing it up because theres WAY more veterans on this list then i thought there would be XD

I was thinking maybe 20 - 30 veterans1, and now we have 88!
replies.body_tagged:

It encourages players who may be starting to get bored after a few months of playing to keep going for the veteran rank, and its not something you have to be good at to get, its more like an acknowledgement for someones dedication towards being a part of the community and game..

replies.body:
I was here since McZone (about two years ago). So very much has changed, mostly for the better!


Note: I did take about an eight month long break in the year of 2014, however, so most of you probably never saw me around.


Anyways, it has been an amazing experience, all thanks to great work by the staff members, and, I must add, excellent competition among the players.

replies.body: I've been on for 2 years 1 of them was on a different account the username is "crombies". BTW I've just been shocked at how far avicus-mczone has come. I've seen mods and friends come and go. Mczone used to be a place where I'd just go for a quick game of SG and for the tightly knit community now it has turned into a huge hub server where I barely recognize anyone and it just amazes me.

replies.body:
Guys, I'm going to be totally honest; this list is going to be extremely hard and time consuming to update, considering I made this post 9 months ago.
Not only am i adding people, but I need to filter through the entire list to see who isn't active anymore (and take them off) and who has reached 2/3 years..

So if you've recently added your name, expect it to take a few hours to make the list, if not tomorrow even...
